title: Buffy S8 Part 1 (Issues 1-19|2007-08|Dgtl-1500 + Motion Comics)
description:
Contains: What it says on the tin.

The comics are Empire's Digital-TPB Mid-Res releases from the latest Weeklies, repackaged into seven volumes per narrative continuity and bookended with additional variant covers from various earlier single-issue releases and re-releases.

The motion comics are <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/user/twentyforty" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/user/twentyforty</a>  's encodes, from a BluRay source, at standard definition (704x400), using an AVC codec and MP4 container. Duration is about 12 minutes per episode/issue.

---

For the later comics (issues 21-40 plus a handful of specials and shorts), digital re-releases are not yet available, and the corresponding motion comics were never created in the first place, as far as I can tell.
